ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To provide management direction and support for information security in accordance with business requirements and relevant laws and regulations.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Policies for information security
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: An information security policy document shall be approved by management, and published and communicated to all employees and relevant external parties.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 5.1: Information security policies: Management direction for information security

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To provide management direction and support for information security in accordance with business requirements and relevant laws and regulations.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Review of the policies for information security
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: The information security policy shall be reviewed at planned intervals or if significant changes occur to ensure its continuing suitability, adequacy, and effectiveness.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 5.1: Information security policies: Management direction for information security

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To manage information security within the organization.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Information security roles and responsibilities
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Management shall actively support security within the organization through clear direction, demonstrated commitment, explicit assignment, and acknowledgement of information security responsibilities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 6.1: Organization of information security: Internal Organization

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To manage information security within the organization.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Segregation of duties
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Information security activities shall be co-ordinated by representatives from different parts of the organization with relevant roles and job function.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 6.1: Organization of information security: Internal Organization

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To manage information security within the organization.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Contact with authorities
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: All information security responsibilities shall be clearly defined.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 6.1: Organization of information security: Internal Organization

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To manage information security within the organization.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Contact with special interest groups
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: A management authorization process for new information processing facilities shall be defined and implemented.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 6.1: Organization of information security: Internal Organization

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To manage information security within the organization.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Information security in project management
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Requirements for confidentiality or non-disclosure agreements reflecting the organization's needs for the protection of information shall be identified and regularly reviewed.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 6.1: Organization of information security: Internal Organization

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To maintain the security of organization's information and information processing facilities that are accessed, processed, communicated to, or managed by external parties.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Mobile device policy
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: The risks to the organization's information and information processing facilities from business processes involving external parties shall be identified and appropriate controls implemented before granting access.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 6.2: Organization of information security: Mobile devices and teleworking

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To maintain the security of organization's information and information processing facilities that are accessed, processed, communicated to, or managed by external parties.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Teleworking
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: All identified security requirements shall be addressed before giving customers access to the organization's information or assets.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 6.2: Organization of information security: Mobile devices and teleworking

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To achieve and maintain appropriate protection of organizational assets.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Screening
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: All assets shall be clearly identified and an inventory of all important assets drawn up and maintained.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 7.1: Human Resources Security: Prior to employment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To achieve and maintain appropriate protection of organizational assets.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Terms and conditions of employment
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: All information and assets associated with information processing facilities shall be owned by a designated part of the organization.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 7.1: Human Resources Security: Prior to employment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that information receives an appropriate level of protection.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Management responsibilities
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Information shall be classified in terms of its value, legal requirements, sensitivity and criticality to the organization.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 7.2: Human Resources Security: During employment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that information receives an appropriate level of protection.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Information security awareness, education and training
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: An appropriate set of procedures for information labelling and handling shall be developed and implemented in accordance with the classification scheme adopted by the organization.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 7.2: Human Resources Security: During employment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that information receives an appropriate level of protection.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Disciplinary process
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: There should be a formal and communicated disciplinary process in place to take action against employees who have committed an information security breach.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 7.2: Human Resources Security: During employment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To protect the organization’s interests as part of the process of changing or terminating employment.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Termination or change of employment responsibilities
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Information security responsibilities and duties that remain valid after termination or change of employment should be defined, communicated to the employee or contractor and enforced.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 7.3: Human Resources Security: Termination and change of employment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that employees, contractors and third party users understand their responsibilities, and are suitable for the roles they are considered for, and to reduce the risk of theft, fraud or misuse of facilities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Inventory of Assets
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Security roles and responsibilities of employees, contractors and third party users shall be defined and documented in accordance with the organization's information security policy.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 8.1: Asset Management: Responsibility for Assets

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that employees, contractors and third party users understand their responsibilities, and are suitable for the roles they are considered for, and to reduce the risk of theft, fraud or misuse of facilities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Ownership of assets
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Background verification checks on all candidates for employment, contractors, and third party users shall be carried out in accordance with relevant laws, regulations and ethics, and proportional to the business requirements, the classification of the information to be accessed, and the perceived risks.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 8.1: Asset Management: Responsibility for Assets

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that employees, contractors and third party users understand their responsibilities, and are suitable for the roles they are considered for, and to reduce the risk of theft, fraud or misuse of facilities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Management of removable media
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: As part of their contractual obligation, employees, contractors and third party users shall agree and sign the terms and conditions of their employment contract, which shall state their and the organization's responsibilities for information security.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 8.1: Asset Management: Responsibility for Assets

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that employees, contractors and third party users understand their responsibilities, and are suitable for the roles they are considered for, and to reduce the risk of theft, fraud or misuse of facilities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Return of assets
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: All employees and external party users should return all of the organizational assets in their possession upon termination of their employment, contract or agreement.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 8.1: Asset Management: Responsibility for Assets

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that all employees, contractors and third party users are aware of information security threats and concerns, their responsibilities and liabilities, and are equipped to support organizational security policy in the course of their normal work, and to reduce the risk of human error.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Classification of information
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Management shall require employees, contractors and third party users to apply security in accordance with established policies and procedures of the organization.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 8.2: Asset Management: Information classification

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that all employees, contractors and third party users are aware of information security threats and concerns, their responsibilities and liabilities, and are equipped to support organizational security policy in the course of their normal work, and to reduce the risk of human error.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Labelling of information
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: All employees of the organization and, where relevant, contractors and third-party users, shall receive appropriate awareness training and regular updates in organizational policies and procedures, as relevant for their job function.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 8.2: Asset Management: Information classification

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that all employees, contractors and third party users are aware of information security threats and concerns, their responsibilities and liabilities, and are equipped to support organizational security policy in the course of their normal work, and to reduce the risk of human error.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Handling of assets
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Procedures for handling assets should be developed and implemented in accordance with the information classification scheme adopted by the organization.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 8.2: Asset Management: Information classification

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that employees, contractors and third party users exit an organization or change employment in an orderly manner.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Management of removeable media
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Responsibilities for performing employment termination or change of employment shall be clearly defined and assigned.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 8.3: Asset Management: Media handling

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that employees, contractors and third party users exit an organization or change employment in an orderly manner.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Disposal of media
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: All employees, contractors and third party users shall return all of the organization's assets in their possession upon termination of their employment, contract or agreement.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 8.3: Asset Management: Media handling

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that employees, contractors and third party users exit an organization or change employment in an orderly manner.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Physical media transfer
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: The access rights of all employees, contractors and third party users to information and information processing facilities shall be removed upon termination of their employment, contract or agreement, or adjusted upon change.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 8.3: Asset Management: Media handling

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent unauthorized physical access, damage and interference to the organization's premises and information.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Access control policy
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Security perimeters (barriers such as walls, card controlled entry gates or manned reception desks) shall be used to protect areas that contain information and information processing facilities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.1: Access Control: Business requirements of access control

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent unauthorized physical access, damage and interference to the organization's premises and information.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Access to networks and network services
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Secure areas shall be protected by appropriate entry controls to ensure that only authorized personnel are allowed access.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.1: Access Control: Business requirements of access control

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent loss, damage, theft or compromise of assets and interruption to organization's activities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: User registration and de-registration
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Equipment shall be sited or protected to reduce the risks from environmental threats and hazards, and opportunities for unauthorized access.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.2: Access Control: User access management

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent loss, damage, theft or compromise of assets and interruption to organization's activities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: User access provisioning
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Equipment shall be protected from power failures and other disruptions caused by failures in supporting utilities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.2: Access Control: User access management

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent loss, damage, theft or compromise of assets and interruption to organization's activities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Management of privileged access rights
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Power and telecommunications cabling carrying data or supporting information services shall be protected from interception or damage.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.2: Access Control: User access management

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent loss, damage, theft or compromise of assets and interruption to organization's activities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Management of secret authentication information of users
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Equipment shall be correctly maintained to enable its continued availability and integrity.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.2: Access Control: User access management

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent loss, damage, theft or compromise of assets and interruption to organization's activities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Review of user access rights
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Security shall be applied to off-site equipment taking into account the different risks of working outside the organization's premises.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.2: Access Control: User access management

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent loss, damage, theft or compromise of assets and interruption to organization's activities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Removal or adjustment of access rights
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: All items of equipment containing storage media shall be checked to ensure that any sensitive data and licensed software has been removed or securely overwritten prior to disposal.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.2: Access Control: User access management

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To make users accountable for safeguarding their authentication information.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Use of secret authentication information
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Users should be required to follow the organization’s practices in the use of secret authentication information.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.3: Access Control: User responsibilities

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent unauthorized access to systems and applications.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Information access restriction
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Access to information and application system functions should be restricted in accordance with the access control policy.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.4: Access Control: System and application access control

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent unauthorized access to systems and applications.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Secure log-on procedures
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Where required by the access control policy, access to systems and applications should be controlled by a secure log-on procedure.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.4: Access Control: System and application access control

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent unauthorized access to systems and applications.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Password management system
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Password management systems should be interactive and should ensure quality passwords.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.4: Access Control: System and application access control

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent unauthorized access to systems and applications.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Use of privileged utility programs
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: The use of utility programs that might be capable of overriding system and application controls should be restricted and tightly controlled.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.4: Access Control: System and application access control

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent unauthorized access to systems and applications.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Access control to program source code
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Access to program source code should be restricted.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 9.4: Access Control: System and application access control

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure the correct and secure operation of information processing facilities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Policy on the use of cryptographic controls
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Operating procedures shall be documented, maintained, and made available to all users who need them.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 10.1: Cryptography: Cryptographic controls

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure the correct and secure operation of information processing facilities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Key management
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Changes to information processing facilities and systems shall be controlled.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 10.1: Cryptography: Cryptographic controls

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To control access to information.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Physical security perimeter
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: An access control policy shall be established, documented, and reviewed based on business and security requirements for access.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.1: Physical and Environmental Security: Secure Areas

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To control access to information.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Physical entry controls
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Secure areas should be protected by appropriate entry controls to ensure that only authorized personnel are allowed access.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.1: Physical and Environmental Security: Secure Areas

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To control access to information.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Securing offices, rooms and facilities
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Physical security for offices, rooms and facilities should be designed and applied.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.1: Physical and Environmental Security: Secure Areas

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To control access to information.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Protecting against external and environmental attacks
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Physical protection against natural disasters, malicious attack or accidents should be designed and applied.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.1: Physical and Environmental Security: Secure Areas

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To control access to information.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Working in secure areas
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Procedures for working in secure areas should be designed and applied.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.1: Physical and Environmental Security: Secure Areas

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To control access to information.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Delivery and loading areas
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Access points such as delivery and loading areas and other points where unauthorized persons could enter the premises should be controlled and, if possible, isolated from information processing facilities to avoid unauthorized access.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.1: Physical and Environmental Security: Secure Areas

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure authorized user access and to prevent unauthorized access to information systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Equipment siting and protection
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: There shall be a formal user registration and de-registration procedure in place for granting and revoking access to all information systems and services.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.2: Physical and Environmental Security: Equipment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure authorized user access and to prevent unauthorized access to information systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Supporting utilities
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: The allocation and use of privileges shall be restricted and controlled.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.2: Physical and Environmental Security: Equipment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure authorized user access and to prevent unauthorized access to information systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Cabling Security
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: The allocation of passwords shall be controlled through a formal management process.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.2: Physical and Environmental Security: Equipment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure authorized user access and to prevent unauthorized access to information systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Equipment maintenance
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Management shall  review users' access rights at regular intervals using a formal process.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.2: Physical and Environmental Security: Equipment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure authorized user access and to prevent unauthorized access to information systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Removal of assets
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Equipment, information or software should not be taken off-site without prior authorization.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.2: Physical and Environmental Security: Equipment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure authorized user access and to prevent unauthorized access to information systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Security of equipment and assets off-premises
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Security should be applied to off-site assets taking into account the different risks of working outside the organization’s premises.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.2: Physical and Environmental Security: Equipment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure authorized user access and to prevent unauthorized access to information systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Secure disposal or re-use of equipment
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: All items of equipment containing storage media should be verified to ensure that any sensitive data and licensed software has been removed or securely overwritten prior to disposal or re-use.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.2: Physical and Environmental Security: Equipment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure authorized user access and to prevent unauthorized access to information systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Unattended user equipment
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Users should ensure that unattended equipment has appropriate protection.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.2: Physical and Environmental Security: Equipment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure authorized user access and to prevent unauthorized access to information systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Clear desk and clear screen policy
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: A clear desk policy for papers and removable storage media and a clear screen policy for information processing facilities should be adopted.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 11.2: Physical and Environmental Security: Equipment

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that security is an integral part of information systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Documented operating procedures
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Statements of business requirements for new information systems, or enhancements to existing information systems shall specify the requirements for security controls.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.1: Operations security: Operational procedures and responsibilities

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that security is an integral part of information systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Change management
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Changes to the organization, business processes, information processing facilities and systems that affect information security should be controlled.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.1: Operations security: Operational procedures and responsibilities

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that security is an integral part of information systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Capacity management
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: The use of resources should be monitored, tuned and projections made of future capacity requirements to ensure the required system performance.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.1: Operations security: Operational procedures and responsibilities

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure that security is an integral part of information systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Separation of development, testing and operational environments
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Development, testing, and operational environments should be separated to reduce the risks of unauthorized access or changes to the operational environment.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.1: Operations security: Operational procedures and responsibilities

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To prevent errors, loss, unauthorized modification or misuse of information in application.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Controls against malware
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Data input to applications shall be validated to ensure that this data is correct and appropriate.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.2: Operations security: Protection from malware

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To protect the confidentiality, authenticity or integrity of information by cryptographic means.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Information backup
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: A policy on the use of cryptographic controls for protection of information shall be developed and implemented.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.3: Operations security: Backup

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure the security of system files
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Event logging
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: There shall be procedures in place to control the installation of software on operational systems
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.4: Operations security: Logging and monitoring

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure the security of system files
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Protection of log information
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Test data shall be selected carefully, and protected and controlled.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.4: Operations security: Logging and monitoring

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure the security of system files
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Administrator and operator logs
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Access to program source code shall be restricted.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.4: Operations security: Logging and monitoring

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure the security of system files
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Clock synchronisation
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: The clocks of all relevant information processing systems within an organization or security domain should be synchronised to a single reference time source.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.4: Operations security: Logging and monitoring

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To maintain the security of application system software and information.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Installation of software on operational systems
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: The implementation of changes shall be controlled by the use of formal change control procedures.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.5: Operations security: Control of operational software

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To reduce risks resulting from exploitation of published technical vulnerabilities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Control of technical vulnerabilities
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Timely information about technical vulnerabilities of information systems being used shall be obtained, the organization's exposure to such vulnerabilities evaluated, and appropriate measures taken to address the associated risk.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.6: Operations security: Technical Vulnerability Management

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To reduce risks resulting from exploitation of published technical vulnerabilities.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Restrictions on software installation
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Rules governing the installation of software by users should be established and implemented.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.6: Operations security: Technical Vulnerability Management

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To minimise the impact of audit activities on operational systems.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Information systems audit controls
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Audit requirements and activities involving verification of operational systems should be carefully planned and agreed to minimize disruptions to business processes.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 12.7: Operations security: Information systems audit controls

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure information security events and weaknesses associated with information systems are communicated in a manner allowing timely corrective action to be taken.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Network controls
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Information security events shall be reported through appropriate management channels as quickly as possible.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 13.1: Communications security: Network security management

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure information security events and weaknesses associated with information systems are communicated in a manner allowing timely corrective action to be taken.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Security of network services
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: All employees, contractors and third party users of information systems and services shall be required to note and report any observed or suspected security weaknesses in systems or services.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 13.1: Communications security: Network security management

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure information security events and weaknesses associated with information systems are communicated in a manner allowing timely corrective action to be taken.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Segregation in networks
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Groups of information services, users and information systems should be segregated on networks.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 13.1: Communications security: Network security management

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure a consistent and effective approach is applied to the management of information security incidents.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Title: Information transfer policies and procedures
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Description: Management responsibilities and procedures shall be established to ensure a quick, effective and orderly response to information security incidents.
ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.References: 13.2: Communications security: Information transfer

ISO IEC 27002 Controls to NIST.Category Description: To ensure a consistent and effective approach is applied to the management of information security incidents.
